title: Graduation Ceremony
description: Celebrate the achievements of our graduating students with performances, awards, and speeches.

title: Inter-House Sports Competition
description: Exciting sports activities including football, volleyball, and athletics among classes.

title: Cultural Day Celebration
description: A day to showcase diverse cultural dances, traditional foods, and fashion displays.

description: An evening of beautiful carols, drama, and festive joy to mark the Christmas season.

title: Science & Robotics Exhibition
description: Students present innovative projects in coding, robotics, and STEM exploration.
